preibisch_imagelib2.view.composite

Class CompositeIntervalView<T,C extends Composite<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • preibisch_imagelib2.view.composite.CompositeView<T,C>
      • preibisch_imagelib2.view.composite.CompositeIntervalView<T,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dimensions, EuclideanSpace, Interval, RandomAccessible<C>, RandomAccessibleInterval<C>, RealInterval

    public class CompositeIntervalView<T,C extends Composite<T>>
extends CompositeView<T,C>
implements RandomAccessibleInterval<C>
    CompositeView of a RandomAccessibleInterval.
    Author:
    Stephan Saalfeld
